strategy: Minervan Tank Legion armies have a Strategy Rating of 2.
Initiative: All formations have an Initiative Rating of 2+.
usage: The following army list allows you to field an army based on the Minervan Tank Legion Regiment

formations.name: Minervan Tank Company
formations.units: One Leman Russ Vanquisher with a Commissar-Captain, nine Leman Russ
extraUnits: Replace nine Leman Russ with nine Leman Russ Punishers: Free

formations.name: Minervan Super-Heavy Company
formations.units: Three Baneblades, Stormblades, Stormswords, Stormhammers, and/or Shadowswords, one with a Commissar-Captain

formations.name: Artillery Company
formations.units: Six Basilisks, one with a Commissar-Captain
extraUnits: Replace six Basilisks with six Manticores: 50 points

sections.name: Minervan Support Formations
sections.description: Up to three Support Formations for each Minervan Company.

formations.name: Leman Russ Platoon
formations.units: Six Leman Russ, Leman Russ Executioners, Leman Russ Punishers, Leman Russ Thunderers or Leman Russ Conquerors

formations.name: Minervan Mechanized Infantry Company
formations.units: One Leman Russ Conqueror with a Commissar-Captain, eight Infantry and four Chimeras
extraUnits: Add three Leman Russ, Leman Russ Conquerors, or Leman Russ Punishers: 125 points

formations.name: Artillery Battery
extraUnits: Replace three Basilisks with three Manticores: 25 points

formations.name: Super-Heavy Platoon
formations.units: One Baneblade, Stormsword, Stormhammer, or Stormblade
extraUnits: Replace one Baneblade, Stormsword, Stormhammer, or Stormblade with a Shadowsword: 25 points

sections.name: Collegia Titanica and Imperial Navy Formations
sections.description: Up to a third of the points available may be spent on Collegia Titanica and Imperial Navy Formations

formations.name: Warhound Pack
extraUnits: Warhound Pack gains the 'Independent' special rule: 50 points

formations.name: 0–1 Orbital Support
extraUnits: Replace with an Emperor Class Battleship for +50 points

upgrades.title: Minervan Tank Legion Upgrades
upgrades.description: Each upgrade may be taken once per formation.

options.description: Replace one Commissar-Captain in the army with a Lord Commissar
